item.title: The Return of Clint the Stranger
item.description: The Return of Clint the Stranger is a 1972 Italian-Spanish Western film directed by Alfonso Balcázar and starring Klaus Kinski. The film is a sequel to Clint the Stranger.

item.title: Garringo
item.description: Garringo is a 1969 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Rafael Romero Marchent.

item.title: Perché uccidi ancora
item.description: Perché uccidi ancora is a 1965 Italian western film adventure directed by José Antonio de la Loma and Edoardo Mulargia.

item.title: Fury of Johnny Kid
item.description: Fury of Johnny Kid is a 1967 Italian-Spanish film directed by Gianni Puccini. The Italian and Spanish versions of the film have different ending. The film is a spaghetti western version of William Shakespeare's tragedy Romeo and Juliet.

item.title: Dead Men Don't Count
item.description: Dead Men Don't Count is a 1968 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Rafael Romero Marchent.

item.title: Have a Good Funeral, My Friend... Sartana Will Pay
item.description: Have a Good Funeral, My Friend... Sartana Will Pay is a 1970 Spaghetti Western film directed by Giuliano Carnimeo, written by Roberto Gianviti and starring Gianni Garko.

item.title: Centomila dollari per Ringo
item.description: 100.000 dollari per Ringo is a 1965 spaghetti western film directed by Alberto De Martino.

item.title: Ballad of a Bounty Hunter
item.description: Ballad of a Bounty Hunter is a 1968 Spanish western film directed by Joaquín Luis Romero Marchent and distributed by Troma Entertainment.

item.title: The Texican
item.description: The Texican is a Technicolor 1966 Techniscope film produced and written by John C. Champion and directed by Lesley Selander. It is a paella western remake of their 1948 film Panhandle adapted for the persona of Audie Murphy that featured Broderick Crawford as the heavy. The film was retitled Ringo il Texano in Italy to coincide with the popularity of the Ringo spaghetti western film series.

item.title: The Relentless Four
item.description: The Relentless Four or I quattro inesorabili is a 1965 Italian Spaghetti Western film in Eastmancolor directed by Primo Zeglio.
